textList : process(textList); } function getChapterContent(chapterNumber) { let chapterContent = []; let currentChapter = -1; let isFirstHeadlineFound = false; for (let i = 0; i < data.length; i++) { let item = data[i]; if (item.type === 'headline') { currentChapter++; if (!isFirstHeadlineFound) { isFirstHeadlineFound = true; } if (currentChapter > chapterNumber) { break; } } if ((currentChapter === chapterNumber) || (chapterNumber === 0 && !isFirstHeadlineFound && item.type !== 'headline')) { if(item.type === "illus")chapterContent.push(`\n`); if(item.type !== 'headline')chapterContent.push(extractContent(item)); } } return chapterContent.length > 0 ? chapterContent.join('\n') : null; } result = ""; // æ£€æŸ¥æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨ç« èŠ‚é€»è¾‘ if (book.bookUrl.includes("ebook")) { let index = chapter.index; result = getChapterContent(index); } else { // éå†æ•°æ®ï¼Œæå–å¹¶æ‹¼æ¥ content data.forEach(item => { if(item.type === "illus")result += `\n` result += extractContent(item) + "\n"; // æ¯ä¸ªæ®µè½æ¢è¡Œ }); } }else{ bookName = java.getString("@class.article-title@text"); bookAuthor = java.getString("@class.author-item@text"); imgSrc = java.getString("@class.cover shadow-cover@img@src"); info = java.getString("@class.info@p@text"); result = `â—ï¸åˆ·æ–°æœ¬ç« è·³è½¬åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶ç•Œé¢â—ï¸\nä¹¦åï¼š${bookName}\nä½œè€…ï¼š${bookAuthor}\n\nç®€ä»‹ï¼š\n${info}` if(book.durChapterIndex === chapter.index){ url = "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl; script = `data:text/html;charset=utf-8, ã€Š${bookName}ã€‹åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶

è·³è½¬åŠ å…¥ä¹¦æ¶

ç®€ä»‹ï¼š${info}

`; java.startBrowser(script,"ã€Š"+bookName+"ã€‹") } } result

ruleToc.chapterUrl:
<js>
if(java.get("is_bundle")=="false"){
aid = "{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/(\d+)/)[1]:"{{$.id}}";

id="{{$.id}}"==""?"{{@@href}}".match(/ebook\/\d+\/toc\/(\d+)/)[1]:"";
url = "https://read.douban.com/j/article_v2/get_reader_data";
body = "aid="+aid;
result = url +","+ JSON.stringify({
	"method":"POST",
	"body":String(body),
	"headers":{
		"referer":"https://read.douban.com/reader/column/{{baseUrl.match(/\/(\d+)\//)[1]}}/chapter/"+(id!=""?id:aid)+"/",
		"X-CSRF-TOKEN":java.get("X-CSRF-TOKEN")
		}
	});
	}else{
		result = java.getString("@tag.a.0@href")
		}
</js>
